name: Spark Mk1
description:
It’s time for something new! Infiltrate the Evil Corporation's network and save the world from catastrophe in this fast paced non-stop action game that will challenge your reflexes and memory. Use a controller or the keyboard and mouse to navigate past system defenses. Spark MK1 features a full story mode and a challenge mode.

BASICS

Once the level starts the player cannot stop. Maneuver your way past enemies and obstacles and reach the exit. Start with the maximum score and lose points with every hit.

STORY MODE

Choose your difficulty and embark on an adventure to rescue the planet from the Evil Corporation. Every level completed in story mode is unlocked for challenge mode. The cut scenes feature 8 bit pixel art graphics.

CHALLENGE MODE

Replay every level with the ability to increase your score multiplier by adjusting your stats including health, shields, weapon, time, speed, and difficulty. Show the world your gamer skills and climb the leaderboards by adjusting your stats to ridiculously low levels!

DIFFICULTY

This game is difficult on purpose. You can beat every level with a low score but you will need to harness your gamer skills to get the ultimate leaderboard score. Levels are mastered by replaying them and learning how to navigate past the enemies and obstacles. Some enemies are predictable but some are random, testing your reflexes…

FEATURES

• Use a controller, keyboard and mouse, or both
• Fast paced non-stop action
• Cloud saves
• Awesome soundtrack
• Leaderboards
• Achievements
• Captivating story
